title: Update libwebp to v1.4.0
body:
**Description of Change**

Updates the skia dependency libwebp to the latest tagged: 1.4.0

Previously was also a tag: v1.3.2

**Bugs Fixed**

- Closes #3055

<!-- Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR. -->

**Required skia PR**

https://github.com/mono/skia/pull/147
